languages.text: Эта граната создает область {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Когда любое существо входит в эту область (или находится там в момент ее появления), оно получает 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 20%, а также горение (15) на 3 раунда.

traits.locale_text: Эта граната создает область {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Когда любое существо входит в эту область (или находится там в момент ее появления), оно получает 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 20%, а также горение (15) на 3 раунда.

languages.text: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and burning (15) for 3 rounds.
languages.original_text: Эта граната создает область {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}. Когда любое существо перемещается в эту область (или находится там в момент ее появления), оно получает 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}огненного урона{/g} с {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}пробитием брони{/g} 20%, а также горение (15) на 3 раунда.

traits.locale_text: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g} with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g} and burning (15) for 3 rounds.

This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and burning (15) for 3 rounds.

This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and burning (15) for 3 rounds.

languages.text: Bu bomba, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca süren {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanan{/g} bir alan oluşturur. Bu alana giren (veya etki uygulandığı anda orada duran) bir yaratık, %20 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerine sahip 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g} alır ve yanmaya (15) maruz kalır. Etkisi 3 raunt sürer.
languages.original_text: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and burning (15) for 3 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Bu bomba, 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} boyunca süren {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}yanan{/g} bir alan oluşturur. Bu alana giren (veya etki uygulandığı anda orada duran) bir yaratık, %20 {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}zırh delme{/g} değerine sahip 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}ateş hasarı{/g} alır ve yanmaya (15) maruz kalır. Etkisi 3 raunt sürer.

languages.text: Esta granada crea una zona {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiente{/g} que dura 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Cualquier criatura que entre en la zona (o que esté en ella al aplicarse el efecto) sufre 20 puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g}, con una {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 20 % y quemadura (15) durante 3 asaltos.
languages.original_text: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and burning (15) for 3 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Esta granada crea una zona {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardiente{/g} que dura 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}. Cualquier criatura que entre en la zona (o que esté en ella al aplicarse el efecto) sufre 20 puntos de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}daño por fuego{/g}, con una {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}penetración de armadura{/g} del 20 % y quemadura (15) durante 3 asaltos.

languages.text: 手雷会形成一片{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}区域，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。所有进入燃烧区域的生物（或是手雷爆炸时处于该区域内的生物）都会受到20点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。此次攻击拥有20%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，同时施加燃烧（15）状态，持续三轮。
languages.original_text: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and burning (15) for 3 rounds.

traits.locale_text: 手雷会形成一片{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}区域，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。所有进入燃烧区域的生物（或是手雷爆炸时处于该区域内的生物）都会受到20点{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}火焰伤害{/g}。此次攻击拥有20%{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}护甲穿透{/g}，同时施加燃烧（15）状态，持续三轮。

languages.text: Cette grenade crée une zone {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardente{/g} qui dure 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Toutes les créatures qui y pénètrent ou qui s'y trouvent déjà au moment où l'effet est appliqué subissent 20 points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} avec 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}, ainsi que l'effet Combustion (15) pendant 3 rounds.
languages.original_text: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and burning (15) for 3 rounds.

traits.locale_text: Cette grenade crée une zone {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}ardente{/g} qui dure 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Toutes les créatures qui y pénètrent ou qui s'y trouvent déjà au moment où l'effet est appliqué subissent 20 points de {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}dégâts de feu{/g} avec 20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}pénétration d'armure{/g}, ainsi que l'effet Combustion (15) pendant 3 rounds.

languages.text: このグレネードは、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間継続する{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}エリアを作り出す。このエリアに侵入する（もしくは効果が適用される瞬間にそこに立っている）あらゆる生物は、20%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ20の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}と3ラウンドの炎上（15）を受ける。
languages.original_text: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}. Any creature which enters that area (or stands there at the moment when the effect is applied) suffers 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}fire damage{/g}, with 20% {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}armour penetration{/g}, and burning (15) for 3 rounds.

traits.locale_text: このグレネードは、2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間継続する{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}炎上{/g}エリアを作り出す。このエリアに侵入する（もしくは効果が適用される瞬間にそこに立っている）あらゆる生物は、20%の{g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}アーマー貫通{/g}を持つ20の{g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}炎ダメージ{/g}と3ラウンドの炎上（15）を受ける。

languages.text: Diese Granate erzeugt einen {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Verbrennen{/g}-Bereich, der 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g} lang bestehen bleibt. Kreaturen, die diesen Bereich betreten (oder sich zu Beginn des Effektes darin aufhalten) erleiden 20 {g|Encyclopedia:FireDamage}Feuerschaden{/g} mit 20 % {g|Encyclopedia:ArmourPenetration}Rüstungsdurchdringung{/g} und 3 Runden lang Verbrennen (15).
languages.original_text: This grenade creates a {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} area which lasts for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
